question: [Brief] Portugues: Calcule a area e o perimetro do triangulo definido por (179, 146), (120, 131), (162, 90).

qas.question: [Brief] Portugues: Calcule a area e o perimetro do triangulo definido por (179, 146), (120, 131), (162, 90).
[Check] English: Compute the area and perimeter of the triangle defined by (179, 146), (120, 131), (162, 90). Provide only the area.
[Study] Dansk: Udregn areal og omkreds for trekanten med punkterne (179, 146), (120, 131), (162, 90). Provide only the perimeter.
